item.title: Spade for Devolution?
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“filth scape, post:1, topic:236478”]You can’t have an else statement without an if… And this doesn’t do anything. You probably want something like:

case 952: startAnimation(2843); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; if (absX = 2 && absY = 4) { addItem(lol,lol); } else { sM("Nothing interesting happens."); } break;

So if your coords are that it will give u an item[/quote]
Lol, judging by what you just posted you can’t make/use if statements and braces. That’d give 100 errors. But you’re right about the else without if error it’d cause.

guitars595:

no i meant what rog3r said and where does this code go under checkforskilluse4 or 2? because i thought its supposed to be under 3, but devolution doesn’t have a 3 for some reason

I don’t know, I’ve only just started to get into devolution, so I know little about it. Sorry =/.

Read full topic

item.title: Spade for Devolution?

@Rog3r wrote:

Probably because you added it in the wrong place…
The sM method is really ‘sendMessage’ in Devolution.

item.title: Spade for Devolution?
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Here;

case 952: startAnimation(2843); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; else sM("Nothing interesting happens."); break;
By the way, that would stop the 100 errors, but you’d probably get an else without if error. And why is there even an else statement in there?

Read full topic
